segments.text: I see the woman standing by the sink, completely oblivious to the water flooding the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaked, but she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so focused on the cookies that he doesn’t realize how unstable he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat, like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how peaceful the garden looks through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the chaos inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to have a big mess to clean up soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she’s still polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, I’m worried he’ll fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
